author: treevsy

text: While Earthbound has a quirkier soundtrack (which I prefer overall), Shogo Sakai pulled a real tour de force on the GBA with Mother 3. It feels more serious and tragic, greatly accompanying the emotional storyline and some of the best sprite work I've ever seen. Playing through this game a 2nd time will probably make me appreciate it even more.
author: SupraDarky
